body:
Thank you for your reply. I was using AWS's P3 instances with NVIDIA docker version 17.12. According to NVIDIA's [Release Notes](https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/dgx/pdf/TensorFlow-Release-Notes.pdf)
Have I written custom code: Yes
OS Platform and Distribution: Ubuntu 16.04 
TensorFlow installed from
